mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (user_idx, res_idx, rsv_people, rsv_man, rsv_woman, rsv_baby, rsv_date, rsv_time ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{resIdx}, #{rsvPeople}, #{rsvMan}, #{rsvWoman}, #{rsvBaby}, #{rsvDate}, #{rsvTime});
mapper.select: SELECT reservation_idx FROM reservation WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx} AND res_idx = #{resIdx} AND rsv_date = #{rsvDate} AND rsv_time = #{rsvTime} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( user_idx, res_idx, review_rating, review_content, review_write_date, review_image_1, review_image_2, review_image_3 ) VALUES ( #{userIdx}, #{resIdx}, #{reviewRating}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewWriteDate}, #{reviewImage1}, #{reviewImage2}, #{reviewImage3} );
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_idx, r.review_rating, r.review_content, r.review_write_date, r.review_image_1, res.res_name FROM review r JOIN restaurant res ON r.res_idx = res.res_idx WHERE r.user_idx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY r.review_write_date DESC
